problem.markdown:
This sea change to multi-core parallelism means that the computing community has to rethink: ( ) languages ( ) architectures ( ) algorithms ( ) data structures (x) all of the above ( ) none of the above
[explanation] This is an incredibly exciting time for computing professionals, who have opportunities and challenges rethinking all of the items listed in a-d below. What could language designers do to allow programmers to use novel data structures and algorithms that run on novel hardware to yield the fastest results? [explanation]
problem.p: This sea change to multi-core parallelism means that the computing community has to rethink:

div.p: This is an incredibly exciting time for computing professionals, who have opportunities and challenges rethinking all of the items listed in a-d below. What could language designers do to allow programmers to use novel data structures and algorithms that run on novel hardware to yield the fastest results?
